# Nama Workflow yang akan muncul di tab Actions GitHub

name: Deploy React (Vite) ke GitHub Pages

on:

  # Trigger saat ada push ke branch 'main'

  push:

    branches: ["main"]

  # Memungkinkan deploy manual dari tab Actions

  workflow_dispatch:

# Konfigurasi perizinan untuk GitHub Pages

permissions:

  contents: read

  pages: write

  id-token: write

# Mencegah job deployment ganda

concurrency:

  group: "pages"

  cancel-in-progress: false

jobs:

  build:

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:

      - name: Checkout kode

        uses: actions/checkout@v4

       

      # Setup lingkungan Node.js

      - name: Setup Node.js 20

        uses: actions/setup-node@v4

        with:

          node-version: 20

          cache: 'npm'

     

      # Instalasi dependensi

      - name: Install dependencies

        run: npm install

       

      # Build aplikasi Vite (menghasilkan folder 'dist')

      - name: Build Aplikasi Vite

        run: npm run build

       

      # Setup dan upload artifact (folder 'dist')

      - name: Setup Pages

        uses: actions/configure-pages@v5

       

      - name: Upload artifact (isi folder dist)

        uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3

        with:

          path: './dist'

  deploy:

    environment:

      name: github-pages

      url: ${{ steps.deployment.outputs.page_url }}

    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    needs: build # Job ini harus menunggu 'build' selesai

    steps:

      - name: Deploy ke GitHub Pages

        id: deployment

        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
